posts.subject: Access 8chan on normal Tor?
posts.body:
So according to OP on the linked thread, he was able to access 8ch over an Onion address. I'm quite new to Tor, so could someone point me to the correct Onion address? All the links that I found on the clearnet don't seem to work or link to degenerate shit that's not 8chan. 

EDIT: Well, never mind. It took an eternity to load, but I did find the correct address after all. Sorry for being a noobfag.

http://oxwugzccvk3dk6tj.onion

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/?:users/13E1NfoEM9eYfxk3mZQTLW5qYBekTp5W7v:v:e0a6634e-bb76-4cb6-9c34-719011e548da

>>8094a369-64b4-461b-9733-069853fa2120

Posting from a monarchy right now (Kingdom of Thailand). American feds can't track me here.
